With her debut album, BÃƒÂ©riaux offers 15 original jazzy titles that travel across jazz, pop, and soul with apparent influences of Madeleine Peyroux, Erykah Badu, Fiona Apple, Melody Gardot, and Anita O Day.

As soon as the first notes arise, one is blown away, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Mmmm, doo-i-doo-do-i-a.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ The voice, its tone, its pose, its quality and color, the sound quality, the way the guitar blends in.
